main.name: Vincent Tran
main.bio: Currently a rising junior with roughly 2+ years of professional experience in the software development industry. I have had exposure to everything from automating end-to-end testing to frontend development; However, I am mostly proficient, and interested, in developing backend micro-services and utilizing machine learning frameworks.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Honors Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
education.description: Actively involved in clubs such as IEEE and ACM.
Volunteered as computer science teacher's assistant. Active member of NHS, science NHS, and Mu Alpha Theta.
